description:
Blaze has been doing adult video since the beginning of the year. Another model worked with him on another site, and when he realized Blaze could easily drive to the studio, he asked me to reach out to Blaze.
He is a hot straight guy, but I also get a Bi vibe off of him. Maybe he hasn't figured it out yet that he can have all the options available. With a beautiful smile, naturally hairy, a nice long cock, and stunning eyes, he is a total package.
I did get him in the studio pretty fast and have to admit his beard needs some nice shaping. He is set to come in a week or two for a full sex scene, and pretty sure he will have a pro barber get at.
He is enthusiastic, smart, and loves sex, so I am glad to be featuring him in some ChaosMen videos. I am certain you will agree!
title: Blaze Burton - Solo
